description:
Data reflect the Department of Public Safety and Correctional Service's intakes to correctional facilities, including:  intakes from court, return from mandatory / parole supervision, return from escape, return from mental hospital, and return from Patuxent Institute.

Data reflect the Department of Public Safety and Correctional Service's releases from correctional facilities, including:  expiration of sentence, mandatory release, parole, continued on supervision, commutation, court order, transfer to Patuxent, death, and escape.

metadata.attribution: Department of Public Safety and Correctional Services

name: DPSCS - Intakes & Releases
